May 22, 2023 Retired from Professional Basketball

Aug 06, 2021 Signed a 1 year $2.64 million contract with Los Angeles (LAL)

Nov 21, 2020 Signed a 1 year $2.56 million contract with Portland (POR)

Dec 05, 2019 Portland (POR) fully guaranteed salary for 2019-20

Nov 19, 2019 Signed a 1 year $2.16 million contract with Portland (POR) - non-guaranteed

Feb 01, 2019 Waived by Chicago (CHI)

Jan 22, 2019 Traded to Chicago (CHI) from Houston (HOU) with $1.56 million and Jon Diebler for TBD and Tadija Dragicevic

Aug 13, 2018 Signed a 1 year $2.4 million contract with Houston (HOU)

Jul 30, 2018 Waived by Atlanta (ATL)

Jul 25, 2018 Traded to Atlanta (ATL) from Oklahoma City (OKC) as part of a 3-team trade: Atlanta (ATL) traded Mike Muscala to Philadelphia (PHI); Atlanta (ATL) traded Dennis Schr√∂der to Oklahoma City (OKC); Philadelphia (PHI) traded Justin Anderson to Atlanta (ATL); Philadelphia (PHI) traded Timothe Luwawu-Cabarrot to Oklahoma City (OKC); Oklahoma City (OKC) traded 2022 1st round pick to Atlanta (ATL)

Jun 22, 2018 Declined to exercise Early Termination Option with Oklahoma City (OKC) for 2018-19

Nov 05, 2017 Fined $2,000 for ejection from OKC-POR game

Sep 25, 2017 Traded to Oklahoma City (OKC) from New York (NYK) for Enes Kanter, Doug McDermott and draft pick TBD

Nov 11, 2016 Fined $4,000 for two technicals foul during NYK-BOS game

Jul 15, 2014 Signed a 5 year $124.1 million contract with New York (NYK)

Jun 23, 2014 Exercised Early Termination Option with New York (NYK) to void remaining years of contract

Feb 22, 2011 Traded to New York (NYK) from Denver (DEN) as part of a 3-team trade: Denver (DEN) traded Chauncey Billups, Anthony Carter, Renaldo Balkman, Shelden Williams and Raymond Felton to New York (NYK); Minnesota (MIN) traded 2015 2nd round pick to Denver (DEN); Minnesota (MIN) traded Kosta Koufos to New York (NYK); New York (NYK) traded Danilo Gallinari, Timofey Mozgov, 2012 2nd round pick, 2013 2nd round pick, Wilson Chandler and 2014 1st round pick to Denver (DEN); New York (NYK) traded Anthony Randolph, Corey Brewer and Eddy Curry to Minnesota (MIN)

Feb 22, 2011 Signed a 3 year $64.2 million extension with Denver (DEN)

Feb 22, 2011 Traded to New York (NYK) from Denver (DEN) with Chauncey Billups, Shelden Williams, Anthony Carter, Renaldo Balkman, and Corey Brewer for Wilson Chandler, Raymond Felton, Danilo Gallinari, Timofey Mozgov and Kosta Koufos, the Knicks 2012-2013 2nd round picks, 2014 1st round pick, and cash.

Jul 12, 2006 Signed a 5 year $80 million extension with Denver (DEN)

Oct 28, 2005 Denver (DEN) exercised $4.7 million option for 2006-2007 season

Jul 17, 2003 Signed a 3 year $10.4 million contract with Denver (DEN)

Jun 23, 2003 Drafted by Denver (DEN): Round 1 (#3 overall)
